apiKey.name: LLM API Key
apiKey.hint: Required API key for the LLM service (e.g., OpenRouter). Keep this secret!

llmEndpoint.name: LLM API Endpoint URL
llmEndpoint.hint: URL for the chat completion API. Default: OpenRouter. Compatible with OpenAI-format endpoints.

aiModel.name: LLM Model Name
aiModel.hint: The model identifier to use (e.g., google/gemini-2.5-pro-preview, anthropic/claude-sonnet-4, openai/gpt-4o).

showOfferToPlayers.name: Show AI Offer/Suggestions to Players?
showOfferToPlayers.hint: If checked, players who own the current actor (or all players if no owner) will see the AI turn offer and suggestion messages. If unchecked, only the GM sees these messages.

includeReactionsInPrompt.name: Include Reactions in Prompt
includeReactionsInPrompt.hint: Include Reaction abilities in the list sent to the AI for consideration.

whisperTurnSummary.name: Whisper Turn Summary to GM Only
whisperTurnSummary.hint: If checked, the end-of-turn summary message will only be visible to the GM. If unchecked, it will be sent publicly.

llmTemperature.name: LLM Temperature
llmTemperature.hint: Controls randomness in AI responses. Lower (0.0-0.3) = more focused/deterministic. Higher (0.7-1.0) = more creative/varied. Default: 0.6

defaultTacticalPreset.name: Default Tactical Preset
defaultTacticalPreset.hint: The default tactical behavior for actors without a specific preset assigned.

showProbabilityAnalysis.name: Show Hit Probability Analysis
showProbabilityAnalysis.hint: Calculate and display hit probability percentages and expected damage for strikes against visible enemies. Helps the AI make smarter attack choices.

enableFlankingAnalysis.name: Enable Flanking Detection
enableFlankingAnalysis.hint: Automatically detect flanking situations and opportunities. Enemies show [FLANKING] or [CAN FLANK] markers when applicable.

enableCombatMemory.name: Enable Combat Memory
enableCombatMemory.hint: Track action outcomes across combat rounds. The AI learns from previous successes and failures to adapt its strategy.

enableMultiActionPlanning.name: Enable Multi-Action Planning (Experimental)
enableMultiActionPlanning.hint: Plan full 3-action turns at once instead of one action at a time. Shows a complete turn plan with contingencies.

enablePartyCoordination.name: Enable Party Coordination
enablePartyCoordination.hint: Allow the AI to consider ally actions, coordinate tactics, and suggest complementary strategies when controlling multiple friendly combatants.

autoAssignPartyRoles.name: Auto-Assign Party Roles
autoAssignPartyRoles.hint: Automatically detect and assign tactical roles (Tank, Healer, Striker, Controller, Support, Ranged) to friendly combatants based on their class and abilities.

partyCoordinationLevel.name: Party Coordination Level
partyCoordinationLevel.hint: How detailed should party coordination suggestions be?

choices.standard: Standard - Include coordination hints and opportunities
choices.advanced: Advanced - Full tactical analysis with role-based priorities

chat.turnOfferContent: Allow the AI to control this turn?
chat.manualNotesPlaceholder: Enter any specific instructions or context...
chat.aiNotesDialogLabel: Enter notes for the AI to remember about this character's tactics, personality, or goals:
chat.tacticalPresetHint: Controls how the AI prioritizes actions for this character.

combat.designateInstructions: Click tokens to toggle friendly (green) / enemy (red) status for the AI.
